attributes.action: Change the law to protect Zander fish
attributes.additional_details:
There are conflicting views on the impact they have on our waterways and yet they are still persecuted.  I believe this is cruel and unfair on such an amazing fish.

The law should be changed to stop electrofishing of Zander and removing them from our waterways.
attributes.background: Zander were released into the Great Ouse relief channel in 1963 and since then they have thrived and I feel are a great addition to our waterways.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
